snippet: Natalie Nougayrède, 46, was chosen Friday as the first woman to serve as both director and editor of Le Monde, France’s most prominent newspaper, and its Web site.
abstract: Natalie Nougayrede is chosen as first woman to serve as both director and editor of Le Monde, France's most prominent newspaper.
lead_paragraph: Natalie Nougayrède, 46, was chosen Friday as the first woman to serve as both director and editor of Le Monde, France’s most prominent newspaper, and its Web site.

headline.main: France: Le Monde Picks First Woman for a Top Post
headline.print_headline: France: Le Monde Picks First Woman for a Top Post
